data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=POI-CjKWH9UQ7kNvgFLZKC7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCm9bznPidsk_wA3jSCUcQXInqeGSgM8Bf8xSv8dJtMIA&oe=6640A89C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031471_450514160975639_7876978019992583284_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NyUs0QDGEOcQ7kNvgFvTT3O&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCyLAkRtw7p3w05o5bbU6E7JgwlKHFkWRtXHyFBa4mr3w&oe=6640888C)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75210396_1168100270905037_6056515960548689783_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=C1-g1iaS3QEQ7kNvgFUkl_h&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAHhcCLOzU9-Aj83vJ3CRyi2_kppnekcfYNnw-_-AnaGQ&oe=66408E24)
Dive into a breathtaking experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982554_1365777981490507_857979718693496025_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9X0kOdWr7FoQ7kNvgEnh3pp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfD4KK415JCvlU7TC8rgNX0PWuI8qJwt7qggmZkA5XISkg&oe=66409A88)
![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=36e-lN4JwgwQ7kNvgGGE3Te&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCE7YJspVHZh8nYim9iNpnbLYBlVsJQm0UKj-vW1GFlfQ&oe=6640B8D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035438_923857099517367_6431578607880239089_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=uu-YHVWBfBwQ7kNvgFwrjmh&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCg7x44-_0MP4ORgZJZtgJIh50FZdK-ORwjjn2luKThSg&oe=66408893)

![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tKZApplPWDoQ7kNvgGoAN_v&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCUOjkP9GyJE1khsyfLARUHY9XaSJ-vpflwZ8icHWXqyQ&oe=66409B70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75295893_804268758252860_8856952948920548753_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qN74t3xkmCIQ7kNvgG1f6V3&_nc_oc=Adgf74P5HwsjXtkuVBXLOnEVK4zjDvu0U2MJYpxRyxjYGlEuzgXvQOtlUKvWb5kaFD0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBi_h4qXwQC-_P7q7tB-hgUwMswS1_el6SwbzIunVmXWQ&oe=6640B0EB)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BX7Fo3wwNTIQ7kNvgGRKK4p&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfA9ImmPpUfGc2Dfi5tGSaIlId1RPEWLepbRL5NfsbH8Aw&oe=66409997)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë

![{"height":702,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982658_417699267880520_1132379095717972405_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xcUlEbihaIkQ7kNvgF-BciT&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCmmo17vO4YyNDVZz0jYd0-jh8juH1v5maayKndg5dj4Q&oe=66408451)
